input.sentences: all his friends came over to play cards and talk .
they had lots of drinks for everyone .
all his friends spent the evening dancing the night away .
output.sentences: Last week's party was prepared by a male.
It was intended  for friends to play and talk and have fun.
There was lots of drink for every one.
And a cake to cut during the party.
It was such a great well spent night with friend.
